statements: DELETE FROM climate_data WHERE satellite_id = 1 AND latitude > 40;
DELETE FROM climate_data WHERE temperature < 10 OR humidity > 70 AND data_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ClimateData WHERE id = 1 AND temperature > 30;
DELETE FROM ClimatePatterns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM Climate_Data WHERE temperature < 20 AND humidity > 50;
DELETE FROM Climate_Data WHERE longitude < -70 AND humidity > 50;
DELETE FROM climate_data WHERE longitude <= -100 AND humidity > 50;
